body: I'm a little late here, but this is my effort: [http://james-ramsden.com/download/grasshopper-front-and-centre/](http://james-ramsden.com/download/grasshopper-front-and-centre/) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Xl7BOeGlGv97OFOgzW10uUQR7bs7Bm0pT6R6d*EHmcnHBEOJLM03J101CU2J9Ary4XIpEvdEEtkXX37ej8DxGrYbmYIil7WF/legendcombined.png) I had a similar problem a while back, and I wanted a solution that was as simple as possible. The one on the left shows the legend as it naturally comes from a Ladybug component; on the right shows the legend fed into my component instead. It also scales regardless of your zoom level so that it fills your screen in a (fairly) intelligent way.
